import Link from 'next/link'; import {useState} from 'react'; import {Select} from 'antd'; import { TimePicker } from 'antd'; const FormComponent = () => { const { RangePicker } = TimePicker; const { Option } = Select; const Fields = ["Electricité","Electronique","artisanat","Commerce","Industrie de process","Mécanique","Hotellerie","Transports"]; const children = []; Fields.map(Field =>{ children.push(); }) var data = { type: "Société", email : "", password : "", nom : "", prenom : "", companyname: "", title: "Directeur", domaine: [], addresse: "", city: "", mobilephone: "", fixphone: "", gender: "male", horraire: [], }; var [current,setCurrent] = useState(0); var [userData , setData] = useState(data); var [Confirmation,setConf] = useState(""); var [codeVerif , setCode] = useState(""); var [checkbox,setCheck] = useState(false); const handleChange = (event)=>{ let { name , value } = event.target; setData({...data ,[name] : value}); } const handleTime =(time,timestring)=>{ const string = timestring ; setData({...data , horraire : string}) } const handleTag =(value)=>{ const string = value ; setData({...data , domaine : [...data.domaine , string]}); } return (
